version_description:
- Global launch - The Alchemist Code is now available worldwide!
- New story quest unlocked
- New units released
- Multi-language support (French, German, Spanish)
- Screen share feature
- Soul Exchange Shop unlocked
- Gear available
- New bundle available
- Game Center feature
- Apple Watch feature
- UI/UX improvements
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

Gather round Alchemists and warm up in this festive season with plenty of Winter Holiday activities, character skins, and gifts! There's something for everyone!

- Are Elemental Shards confusing you with your limit breaks? Limit Break notification now only shows unit shards.
- You can view your Summon Coin amount in the Summon screen and access the Summon shop by tapping on it.
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

- Be immersed with gripping storylines of your favorite characters in the new story content: Babel Chronicles.
- Break your characters' limits further than before and push them to a whole new level with Enlightenment!
- Gear up your characters with Mementos to give your units an extra edge against tougher foes.
- Replenish your AP with AP recovery items to continue on your adventures!
- Brand New UI with a seamless design to spice things up as our way to show our appreciation for all of your support.
- Be immersed with gripping storylines of your favourite characters in the new story content: Babel Chronicles.
- Beginners rejoice! Visit our newly established Training Hall to learn more about THE ALCHEMIST CODE! "

- Global collaboration with Fate/stay night [UBW]
- Special Fate/stay night[UBW] units, weapons, shop, and events
- Fate/stay night[UBW] collaboration icon and title screen

- The Release of THE ALCHEMIST CODE Chapter 2
- Winter Holiday Special Event Story
- Winter Holiday Skins for Rosa, Lofia, Shayna and Michael
- UI/UX improvements
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

- Global crossover between THE ALCHEMIST CODE and Phantom of the Kill
- Special Phantom of the Kill units, weapons, shop, and events
- Phantom of the Kill crossover icon and title screen
- Stability improvements

Experience The New And Improved THE ALCHEMIST CODE 2.0 Now! Updated With A New User Interface That Will Change Your Gaming Experience!

- Special events and bundles
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

Get the chance to summon the Crown Prince Noctis and his Companions for a limited time only in the FINAL FANTASY XV x THE ALCHEMIST CODE Collaboration!

- Global collaboration with FINAL FANTASY XV
- Special FINAL FANTASY XV units, weapons, shop, and events
- Special events and bundles
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations
- iPhone X Super Retina display support

Sun, Sea and Swimsuits! Summer is here! Play THE ALCHEMIST CODE now to experience fantastic Summer events and grab yourself Summer-themed items too!

- Time Limited Summer Festival Login Campaign
- Special Summer Festival Events, Shop and Bundle
- New Swimsuit Skin release
- New Feature - Multiplay Invite
- New Feature - User Code Login
- New Improvement - Unit name display at unit selection screen
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

THE ALCHEMIST CODE celebrates its First Anniversary next month! Join us for special pre-anniversary events and get the chance to acquire unique items too!

- Login now to get our special Pre-anniversary login bonus
- Check out our special Pre-anniversary events and bundles
- A new feature released: Enchanted Job
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

Get the chance to transmute your favorite State Alchemists in the FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST BROTHERHOOD collaboration in THE ALCHEMIST CODE

- Get our special 1st Anniversary subscription. A bargain not to be missed.
- Check out the amazing deal for our 1st Anniversary gem bundle.
- We are spicing things up with our new milestones and achievements with awesome rewards
- We heard you and now our 24 hour rare summon resets every day at 12:00 World time
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

Get the chance to transmute your favorite State Alchemists in the FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST BROTHERHOOD collaboration in THE ALCHEMIST CODE
- Get our special 1st Anniversary subscription. A bargain not to be missed.
- Check out the amazing deal for our 1st Anniversary gem bundle.
- We are spicing things up with our new milestones and achievements with awesome rewards
- We heard you and now our 24 hour rare summon resets every day at 12:00 World time
- Multiplayer connection issue fix

Gather round Alchemists and warm up in this festive season with plenty of Winter Holiday activities, character skins, and gifts! There's something for everyone!
- Log in now and get your Winter Holiday freebies!
- You can now bookmark up to 40 of your favorite hard quests!
- Blaze through the quests faster than ever before with an additional speed increase to the Fast Forward feature
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

Gather round Alchemists and warm up in this festive season with plenty of Winter Holiday activities, character skins, and gifts! There's something for everyone!

- Be immersed with gripping storylines of your favorite characters in the new story content: Babel Chronicles.

- Gear up your characters with Mementos to give your units an extra edge against tougher foes.

- Beginners rejoice! Visit our newly established Training Hall to learn more about THE ALCHEMIST CODE! "

Be part of the 9 Million Downloads Celebration this May! Download the pinnacle of Japanese Mobile Strategy RPGs enjoyed by millions worldwide now!

- Check out our new feature "Event Board" for the latest promos and events
- Now multi quest and multi tower hosts have the option to enable 2x speed
- Stability improvements
- Bug fixes and general optimizations

Be part of the 9 Million Downloads Celebration this May! Download the pinnacle of Japanese Mobile Strategy RPGs enjoyed by millions worldwide now!

- New player milestone bug fixes

Join our Heroes in defending the world of Babel from the towering menace of Titans in the ATTACK ON TITAN collaboration this June!

- Replay your favorite event quest with our new Event Archive feature
- Head to Alchemy Port to form your very own guild, expand your guild or discuss strategies with your fellow guildmates
- Gather your strongest units and challenge larger-than-life enemies to earn amazing rewards in the new Raid feature"
- Bug fixes and general optimizations
